author: Rachel Thompson
title: Politician has BBC Dad moment in live TV interview and it's truly a sign of the times
description: It's a sign of the times we're living in. Whether it's your child toddling into the background of your video call, or your semi-clothed roommate sauntering through a Zoom meeting, BBC Dad moments are a dime-a-dozen while many of us are staying home. We are, o…
content:
It's a sign of the times we're living in. 
Whether it's your child toddling into the background of your video call, or your semi-clothed roommate sauntering through a Zoom meeting, BBC Dad moments are a dime-a-dozen while many of us are staying home.
